titleInfo.title: ‘Coast Views taken while employed on the Survey of the Arabian Side of the Gulf of Persia By Lieutenant M. Houghton, Draughtsman H.C. Marine’

physicalDescription.extent: 1 unpublished volume illustrated with 20 watercolour, pencil and pen and ink drawings

mods.abstract: Title taken from the Album's title-page.A collection of twenty watercolour coastal views depicting the Arabian coast of the Persian Gulf drawn by Lieutenant Michael Houghton during the survey carried out by the Bombay Marine’s officers between 1820 and 1829.
